Name: Frequency of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ sent before \SW-Reviewer Agreed\
Percentage of manuscripts that received a \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ before receiving a \SW-Reviewer Agreed\
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all cases

Name: Number of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ sent per manuscript
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' activities grouped by the last value of code

Name: Percentage of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ followed by \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2\
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Frequency of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ in the most common process variant
Percentage of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ in manuscripts that required a \SW-EIC Major Revision\ decision
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Number of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ sent after \SW-AE Assign Reviewers\
Percentage of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ that led to a \SW-Reviewer Declined\
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Frequency of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ in manuscripts that were eventually accepted (\RW-EIC Accept\)
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' for cases where activity 'RW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ in relation to all communication activities in the review process
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'all communication activities'

Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' activities for cases where activity 'Unassign Editor' occurs

Name: Frequency of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ in manuscripts that exceeded the Plagiarism Percent Match Threshold
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' for cases where activity 'Plagiarism Percent Match Threshold Exceeded' occurs

Name: Percentage of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ in manuscripts that went through more than one revision cycle
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all cases

Name: Number of \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ in relation to \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2\
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' activities for cases where activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' occurs

Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' out of all 'SW-Reviewer No Response'
